grandmother.name: Grandmother
grandmother.description: You start knowing a good player & their character. If the Demon kills them, you die too.

sailor.name: Sailor
sailor.description: Each night, choose an alive player: either you or they are drunk until dusk. You can't die.

chambermaid.name: Chambermaid
chambermaid.description: Each night, choose 2 alive players (not yourself): you learn how many woke tonight due to their ability.

exorcist.name: Exorcist
exorcist.description: Each night*, choose a player (different to last night): the Demon, if chosen, learns who you are then doesn't wake tonight.

innkeeper.name: Innkeeper
innkeeper.description: Each night*, choose 2 players: they can't die tonight, but 1 is drunk until dusk.

gambler.name: Gambler
gambler.description: Each night*, choose a player & guess their character: if you guess wrong, you die.

gossip.name: Gossip
gossip.description: Each day, you may make a public statement. Tonight, if it was true, a player dies.

courtier.name: Courtier
courtier.description: Once per game, at night, choose a character: they are drunk for 3 nights & 3 days.

professor.name: Professor
professor.description: Once per game, at night*, choose a dead player: if they are a Townsfolk, they are resurrected.

minstrel.name: Minstrel
minstrel.description: When a Minion dies by execution, all other players (except Travellers) are drunk until dusk tomorrow.

tealady.name: Tea Lady
tealady.description: If both your alive neighbors are good, they can't die.

pacifist.name: Pacifist
pacifist.description: Executed good players might not die.

fool.name: Fool
fool.description: The 1st time you die, you don't.

goon.name: Goon
goon.description: Each night, the 1st player to choose you with their ability is drunk until dusk. You become their alignment.

lunatic.name: Lunatic
lunatic.description: You think you are a Demon, but you are not. The Demon knows who you are & who you choose at night.

tinker.name: Tinker
tinker.description: You might die at any time.

moonchild.name: Moonchild
moonchild.description: When you learn that you died, publicly choose 1 alive player. Tonight, if it was a good player, they die.

godfather.name: Godfather
godfather.description: You start knowing which Outsiders are in play. If 1 died today, choose a player tonight: they die. [-1 or +1 Outsider]

devilsadvocate.name: Devil's Advocate
devilsadvocate.description: Each night, choose a living player (different to last night): if executed tomorrow, they don't die.

assassin.name: Assassin
assassin.description: Once per game, at night*, choose a player: they die, even if for some reason they could not.

mastermind.name: Mastermind
mastermind.description: If the Demon dies by execution (ending the game), play for 1 more day. If a player is then executed, their team loses.

zombuul.name: Zombuul
zombuul.description: Each night*, if no-one died today, choose a player: they die. The 1st time you die, you live but register as dead.

pukka.name: Pukka
pukka.description: Each night, choose a player: they are poisoned. The previously poisoned player dies then becomes healthy.

shabaloth.name: Shabaloth
shabaloth.description: Each night*, choose 2 players: they die. A dead player you chose last night might be regurgitated.

po.name: Po
po.description: Each night*, you may choose a player: they die. If your last choice was no-one, choose 3 players tonight.

apprentice.name: Apprentice
apprentice.description: On your 1st night, you gain a Townsfolk ability (if good) or a Minion ability (if evil).

matron.name: Matron
matron.description: Each day, you may choose up to 3 sets of 2 players to swap seats. Players may not leave their seats to talk in private.

voudon.name: Voudon
voudon.description: Only you & the dead can vote. They don't need a vote token to do so. A 50% majority isn't required.

judge.name: Judge
judge.description: Once per game, if another player nominated, you may choose to force the current execution to pass or fail.

bishop.name: Bishop
bishop.description: Only the Storyteller can nominate. At least 1 opposing player must be nominated each day.
